title: Lynda - Configure and Manage VMware vSphere 6 Networking
description:
Lynda - Configure and Manage VMware vSphere 6 Networking

FYI : This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 33m Intermediate Mar 14, 2016  | Uploaded in May 4, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject: IT 
Software: vSphere 
Author: Brandon Neill 

vSphere is a leading virtualization platform. Knowing how to configure a virtual network with vSphere is an important skill for any VMware administrator. Join Brandon Neill in this course for an overview of vSphere networking, covering the basic concepts of virtualized networking, VMkernel networking, and vSphere standard switches. Along the way, Brandon touches on ESXi components, vSphere traffic shaping, network interface controllers (NICs), and virtual network security.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Overview of the vSphere networking basics
	â€¢	Connecting ESXi networking components
	â€¢	Creating a vSwitch
	â€¢	Configuring VLANs, security, and traffic shaping
	â€¢	Getting network performance data
	â€¢	Configuring VMkernel networks and firewalls
	â€¢	Managing VMkernel routing and TCP/IP stacks
